Career Profile

• DevOps/Platform tech lead for AWS/EKS, CI/CD, and observability, owning reliability, security, and delivery speed for large per-tenant defense programs and prior multi-tenant SaaS.

• Defines cloud/infrastructure patterns and governance (Terraform/Helm/Pulumi) and guides build-vs-buy and sequencing decisions with product and security.

• Leads incident readiness and postmortems, mentoring teams on SLOs, runbooks, and disciplined delivery.

• Deep systems and database background (MySQL/PostgreSQL/MSSQL/NoSQL) plus strong troubleshooting and observability habits.
